title: Trump mulls second aircraft carrier off Iran, as Netanyahu flies to D.C. for talks
summary_full: The threat of an imminent new attack on Tehran follows an inconclusive meeting last week between U.S. envoys and senior Iranian officials.
summary_public: The threat of an imminent new attack on Tehran follows an inconclusive meeting last week between U.S. envoys and senior Iranian officials.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: threat of an imminent new attack on Tehran
